title: Show HN: The current sky at your approximate location, as a CSS gradient
author: dlazaro
aiHeadline: Because who doesn't want their browser to render the sky in real-time using CSS gradients? Now you can have the exact same sky as your neighbor, but in your browser!

title: Debian 13 "Trixie"
author: ducktective
aiHeadline: Debian 13 'Trixie' is here, bringing stability, security, and the same old reliable Debian experience you've come to love and occasionally curse.

title: OpenFreeMap survived 100k requests per second
author: hyperknot
aiHeadline: OpenFreeMap just proved that 100,000 requests per second is totally manageable, unless your server catches on fire or something. But hey, at least it's scalable!

title: My Lethal Trifecta talk at the Bay Area AI Security Meetup
author: vismit2000
aiHeadline: AI Security Experts Warn of Lethal Trifecta: AI, Security, and Your Imminent Doom. Because nothing says 'fun night out' like discussing how AI could end humanity.

title: MCP overlooks hard-won lessons from distributed systems
author: yodon
aiHeadline: MCP Ignores 40 Years of Distributed Systems Wisdom, Because Why Learn from History When You Can Repeat It?
